Title: Mu Rwanda birashoboka kugabanyiriza abakinnyi imishahara kubera Coronavirus?-Icyo abayobozi b’amakipe babivugaho
Body:
Kuva tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020, ibikorwa byose by’imikino byarahagaritswe mu Rwanda mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Kuva tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020, ibikorwa byose by’imikino byarahagaritswe mu Rwanda mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Ni mu gihe kandi kuva ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo kubera ingamba nshya zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyo cyorezo.
Ibi bishobora kugira ngo z’ubukungu ku bigo byinshi birimo ibyakoranaga n’amakipe y’imikino itandukanye ku buryo hari azagorwa no kubona ubushobozi bwo guhemba abakinnyi n’abandi bakozi bayo.
Izi ngamba ntabwo ziri mu Rwanda, ahubwo ni ku Isi yose ndetse amakipe akomeye y’i Burayi arimo FC Barcelone, Bayern Munich na Borussia Dortmund yafashe icyemezo cyo kugabanyiriza imishahara abakinnyi bayo mu rwego rwo kwirinda igihombo gikabije cyaterwa na Coronavirus.
82% by’amakipe 16 akina Shampiyona y’icyicro cya mbere mu Rwanda hari ubufasha bwa Leta abona, binyuze mu turere cyangwa izindi nzego. Rayon Sports, Gasogi United na Heroes FC ni yo makipe atabona inkunga ivuye muri Leta.
Icyo ayo makipe 16 yose ahuriraho kimwe n’ayo mu yindi mikino, ni uko hari icyo yinjizaga binyuze mu bafana barebye imikino cyangwa abaterankunga bakorana nayo.
Mu gihe imikino yahagaze, ntacyo amakipe ari kubona ndetse kuba ibigo byinshi byarabaye bifunze imiryango kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, bivuze ko hari icyagabanutse mu byo byinjizaga ku buryo bigoye ko byakomeza gufasha amakipe.
Ese kugabanyiriza abakinnyi imishahara byaba igisubizo ku makipe yo mu Rwanda?
IGIHE yaganiriye n’abayobozi batandukanye b’amakipe yo mu Rwanda ibabaza niba icyorezo cya Coronavirus nta ngaruka kizagira ku mibereho y’amakipe yabo ndetse niba kugabanyiriza abakinnyi imishahara bishobora kuba kimwe mu bisubizo.
Hari abagaragaje ko abakinnyi bakwiye guhembwa kuko bafite amasezerano abibemera kandi akaba agomba kubahirizwa kuko nta handi bakura.
Abandi bavuze ko hakwiye ibiganiro kuko n’abakinnyi babibona ko ibihe Isi yose irimo bidasanzwe mu gihe bamwe bavuga ko bishobora kuzaba bibi mu gihe iki cyorezo cya Coronavirus cyakomeza.
Uko bamwe mu bayobozi b’amakipe babibona:
Perezida wa AS Muhanga, Ndayisaba Jean Damascène 
Ndayisaba avuga ko ’Kugabanyiriza abakinnyi imishahara ntabwo ari byo. None se iyo umukozi ahagaze kubera impamvu zitamuturutseho ntabwo ahembwa? Ikibazo gikomeye ni ubukene bw’amakipe, ubundi abakinnyi bagomba guhembwa’.
Icyo batazabona ni agahimbazamusyi n’ibyo bahabwaga ku myitozo kuko nta mikino ihari, ariko imishahara yo bagomba kuyibona, ni ko mbitekereza. Muri AS Muhanga tubonye ubushobozi, abakinnyi babona imishahara yabo.
Umwenda w’amakipe uzakomeza wiyongere ariko abakinnyi rwose bazafashwe gukomeza kubaho kuko amasezerano ntabwo araseswa. Nubwo umushahara waba ikirarane.
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate
Muri iki gihe imikino itari kuba, birumvikana ko biba bigoye kubona ubushobozi bwo gutunga abakinnyi no kubahemba, ni nayo mpamvu mwabonye twasabye abafana ko babigira ibyabo, bakadufasha bifashishije ikoranabuhanga kuri za telefoni zabo nubwo na bo batorohewe kubera ibihe turimo.
Ariko mu minsi iri imbere turaza kuganira nka Komite twumve, tunaganirize n’abakinnyi turebe icyo babitekerezaho. Turebe niba hari izindi ngamba zakomeza. Kugeza ubu nta zindi ngamba turabifataho kuko tutaraganira n’abakinnyi nka Komite, ariko biri mu byo dutekereza ko byazadufasha mu gihe twaba tumaze kubyumvikanaho.
Icyo dusaba [abafana] ni ugukomeza gutekereza ko ikipe ari iyabo, nibo bayifasha, nibo ibereyeho, nibo baterankunga bayo b’ibanze. Icyo tubasaba ni uko bakomeza kuyifasha bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga banyuze kuri *610#.
Abafana ba Rayon Sports bamaze gukusanya miliyoni 4 Frw muri miliyoni 20 Frw zifuzwa. Bizagenda gute nizitaboneka?
Aho niho tuzafata izindi ngamba zirimo no kwishakamo ubushobozi nka Komite, ariko na nyuma y’ibyo harimo no kuba twatangira kuganira n’abakinnyi kugira ngo turebe uko twafashanya muri ibi bihe.
Abaterankunga bacu nabo dushobora kuganira ariko nabo bizagorana. Nabo ntabwo boroherewe. Urugero niba dukorana na SKOL, nkeka bari gucuruza nka 10% y’ibyo bacuruzaga. Urumva inkunga baduhaga ishobora guhungabana. Abaterankunga bashya turi gukorana [Airtel, za sitasiyo,..] nabo ni uko.
Karenzi Sam; Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Bugesera FC
Twe ntacyo turabitekerezaho. Icya mbere, ntabwo tuzi igihe bizamara n’impinduka bizagira ku ngengabihe y’imikino. Hazazamo ikibazo nibiramuka bigiye hanze y’igihe cy’ingengo y’imari twakoze, ni ukuvuga bikajya hanze y’ukwezi kwa karindwi kuko tuba turi mu biruhuko, tudahemba.
Abakinnyi ntabahari, natwe turi mu ngo, tuzabiganiraho nibagaruka kuko ntituzi igihe bizamara. Nta mpinduka bigize ku ngengabihe ya Shampiyona, birashoboka ko nta mpinduka byagira ku mishahara yabo.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa APR FC; Lt Col Sekaramba Sylvestre
Njye numva ibyo byaba iby’i Burayi kuko bo imihembere yabo iba iri hejuru ku buryo nubwo umukinnyi yamara amezi abiri adahembwa ashobora gukomeza kubaho. Ariko ukurikije ibyo mu Rwanda, ubakase umushahara, ntabwo babaho kuko batungwa n’uwo mushahara.
Tureke n’abakinnyi, ufashe n’abakozi ba Leta, uvuze ngo ubakate umushahara byaba bigoye. Biratandukanye. Usanga umushahara w’umuntu nawo uba udahagije, uvuze ngo urawugabanya, byaba bikomeye. Kumvikana n’abakinnyi birashoboka, ariko ntabwo bikuraho ko bizagora abakinnyi.
Nko muri APR abakinnyi batunzwe n’umushahara kuko nta kindi bakora, bakaswe umushahara ntabwo babaho. Ku bwanjye numva bakomeza kubahemba.
Perezida akaba na nyiri Gasogi United, KNC
Iki ni igihe gikomeye cyane gisaba kumvikana. Amasezerano ni ubwumvikane bw’abantu babiri, ashobora guhinduka binyuze mu biganiro kandi na none ntekereza ko ari ibihe bidashobora kuramba. Ni ibihe bidasanzwe. Buri masezerano agira iyo ngingo.
Hariho n’amakipe avanaho umushahara burundu, urebye nka Lyon hari n’andi makipe ari kubyigaho nko mu cyiciro cya kabiri mu Bwongereza, ariko na none ntabwo ari ibihe bigomba kureba amakipe gusa, n’ubuyobozi bw’umupira bukwiye kureba icyakorwa kugira ngo ibibazo bizavuka nyuma y’ibi bihe, bizakemurwe mu buryo bwumvikana.
Kugeza uyu munsi, amasezerano ashobora guseswa cyangwa akavugururwa. Umukinnyi yakenera amafaranga abona ava he? Ubuzima bwahagaze. Biramutse bifashe nk’amezi abiri, amasezerano ashobora guhagarara burundu n’ayo make yabonekaga ntibayabone.
Kumvikana kugira ngo hashakwe igisubizo ni ngombwa. Ntabwo ari umupira w’amaguru gusa, nkeka na we aho ukora birengeje amezi atatu waba utizeye ko uzabona umushahara wawe wuzuye.
Ntabwo ari mu Rwanda gusa, niba ikipe nka FC Barcelone yagabanyije umushahara, ntabwo ari ibintu byoroshye. Siporo ni ukwishimisha ariko ubu ni ukurinda ubuzima bw’abantu. Nibyo abakinnyi bakeneye kurya, ariko se niba ahava amafaranga byanze, biragenda gute?
Abakinnyi nabagira inama yo kudasesagura amafaranga make bafite, abayariye nabi bishobora kubagiraho ingaruka. Uburyo bwo kwizigamira bugomba guhinduka muri iki gihe kidasanzwe.
Singombwa ibiganiro n’abakinnyi, ni ukubabwira uko duhagaze. N’abakinnyi ubwabo hagize uzana amananiza yaba afite ikibazo. Niba hari n’abaduteraga inkunga ari uko twakinnye bakagaragara, nta mafaranga bari gutanga ndetse n’ibindi byose byarahagaze, urumva amafaranga yava he?
Na FIFA ubwayo byayicanze kuko niba itangiye kuvuga ngo isoko ry’abakinnyi ryo mu mpeshyi rijye muri Mutarama, ni uko ibona ko bigoye.

Title: Mu Budage abakinnyi bemeye kugabanyirizwa umushahara kubera Coronavirus, aba FC Barcelone ntibabivugaho rumwe
Body:
Abakinnyi ba Bayern Munich na Borussia Dortmund bemeranyije n’abayobozi b’amakipe yabo ko bakatwa umushahara by’agateganyo muri iki gihe Isi yugarijwe na Coronavirus.
Abakinnyi ba Bayern Munich na Borussia Dortmund bemeranyije n’abayobozi b’amakipe yabo ko bakatwa umushahara by’agateganyo muri iki gihe Isi yugarijwe na Coronavirus.
Aya makipe abiri akomeye yo mu Budage yafashe iki cyemezo cyo kugabanyiriza abakinnyi umushahara kugira ngo afashe abandi bakozi bayo ubusanzwe bagiraga icyo babona ari uko hari imikino yabaye.
Muri iki gihe nta mikino iri kuba, amakipe amwe ari gushaka ibisubizo byo kugira ngo atazagwa mu gihombo kubera gukomeza kwishyura abakinnyi amafaranga y’umurengera.
Abakinnyi ba Union Berlin, ya 11 muri Shampiyona y’u Budage, batangaje ko bemeye guhara imishahara yabo.
Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’ikipe yabo ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 25 Werurwe, rivuga ko “abakinnyi bose bo mu ikipe ya mbere, bemeye guhara imishahara yabo. Abandi bakozi b’ikipe bemeye gukomeza gukora amasaha make, bakazahabwa igice cy’umushahara.”
Mu cyumweru gishize, abakinnyi ba Borussia Monchengladbach na bo bari batangaje ko batazasaba imishahara.
Abo muri Bayern Munich bazagabanyirizwa ho 20% by’imishahara bahabwaga mu gihe abo muri Borussia Dortmund, bazahara igice cy’ayo bahembwaga.
Kugeza ku wa Gatatu, mu Budage habarurwaga abantu 31 554 bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu gihe 149 aribo bahitanywe n’icyo cyorezo.
Abakinnyi barimo Leroy Sane, Robert Lewandowski, Leon Goretzka na Joshua Kimmich batanze inkunga yo kurwanya icyo cyorezo.
Muri FC Barcelone, abakinnyi ntibabivugaho rumwe
Mu cyumweru gishize nibwo muri FC Barcelone hafashwe icyemezo cyo kugabanyiriza abakinnyi imishahara kuko ikipe itagifite aho ikura muri iyi minsi imikino yose yahagaze.
Ubuyobozi bwari bwiteze ko abakinnyi bashobora gufata iya mbere, bakemera ko bagabanyirizwa imishahara bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Imishahara y’abakinnyi b’ikipe yayo ya mbere isaga 70% by’imishahara yose y’ikipe. Barcelone yishyura miliyoni 593£ ku makipe yayo yose, aho miliyoni 468 £ zihabwa ikipe y’Umupira w’amaguru, akaba ari yo izarebwaho ngo igabanyirizwe imishahara mu rwego rwo kuziba icyuho cy’ayo iyi kipe itari kwinjiza.
SPORT yo muri Espagne, yatangaje ko abakinnyi ba FC Barcelone bacitsemo ibice bitatu kubera kutumvikana kuri iyo ngingo yo kugabanyirizwa imishahara.
Itsinda rya mbere, ni abakinnyi bateye utwatsi icyo cyemezo, aho bavuga ko batumva impamvu bagabanyirizwa imishahara nyamara ikipe yabo yarapfushije ubusa amafaranga igura abakinnyi batagize icyo bayimariye.
Bivugwa ko iri tsinda ririmo abakinnyi bahembwa menshi, aho bumva ko mu gihe bagabanyirizwa ari bo baba babihombeyemo kurusha abandi.
Itsinda rya kabiri bivugwa ko ririmo bamwe mu bakinnyi bakomeye mu ikipe, rishyigikiye iyo gahunda, ndetse ngo ni ryo ririmo Lionel Messi uheruka gutanga miliyoni 1€ yo kurwanya Coronavirus muri Barcelone na Argentine mu gihe irya gatatu ryo ritegereje kureba icyemezo cya nyuma cyizafatwa.
Abahagarariye amakipe baherutse kugira ibiganiro n’ubuyobozi bwa La Liga ndetse bivugwa ko bemeranyijwe ko abakinnyi bose bo muri Espagne bakwigomwa 10% by’imishahara yabo kuko nta mikino iri kuba.
FC Barcelone ishingiye ku kugurisha amatike, abasuye inzu ndangamurage no kugurisha imyambaro, ariko byose kugeza ubu byarahagaze mu gihe kandi byitezwe ko n’abaterankunga bamwe na bamwe bashobora kutishyura mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko bahura n’ibibazo by’ubukungu.
Iyi kipe ivuga ko gusubika umukino wari kuyihuza na Napoli mu cyumweru gishize, kwayihombeje miliyoni 6€ ndetse kugeza ubu Stade yayo irafunze.
Mu mwaka ushize w’imikino, inzu ndangamurage ya FC Barcelone yinjije hafi miliyoni 60€ mu gihe iduka ryayo ryinjije miliyoni 86€.

Title: Umukino wa Champions League wabaye imbarutso y’ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus mu Butaliyani na Espagne
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Bergamo mu Butaliyani, Giorgio Gori, yavuze ko umukino Atalanta yakiriyemo Valence C.F muri UEFA Champions League ari wo wabaye imbarutso y’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus mu Butaliyani na Espagne.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Bergamo mu Butaliyani, Giorgio Gori, yavuze ko umukino Atalanta yakiriyemo Valence C.F muri UEFA Champions League ari wo wabaye imbarutso y’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus mu Butaliyani na Espagne.
Ibihugu byombi ni byo byugarijwe na Coronavirus kurusha ibindi mu Burayi.
Umukino wa 1/8 cya UEFA Champions League, Atalanta yakiriyemo Valence kuri San Siro tariki ya 19 Gashyantare, warebwe n’abafana ibihumbi 44 mu Mujyi wa Milan.
Giorgio Gori avuga ko uwo mukino ari cyo kintu gikomeye cyatumye Umujyi wa Bergamo wibasirwa cyane mu gihugu, aho abantu 6728 bemejwe ko banduye Coronavirus.
Ikinyamakuru Marca cyatangaje ko uyu muyobozi abinyujije ku rubuga rwa Facebook, yavuze ko “Uwo mukino ari wo nkomoko y’icyorezo mu Butaliyani.”
Yagize ati “Icyo gihe ntitwari tuzi ibyabaga.Niba virusi yari imaze gukwirakwira, abafana ibihumbi 40 bagiye i San Siro baranduye. Nta muntu n’umwe wari uzi ko virusi yari imaze gukwirakwira muri twe.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Benshi barebye umukino begeranye, muri iryo joro habaye gukoranaho [hagati yabafana]."
Atalanta yari yakiriye uwo mukino wa Champions League i San Siro muri Milan kuko stade yayo iri kuvugururwa.
Abafana bayo kandi bashobora kuba barakwirakwije Coronavirus i Bergamo ubwo bavaga i Milan bishimiraga intsinzi y’ibitego 4-1.
Abafana ba Valencia nabo bashobora kuba barakwirakwije Coronavirus iwabo nyuma yo kuva mu Butaliyani.
Nyuma y’umunsi umwe uwo mukino ubaye, hari umugabo wagaragayeho Coronavirus i Lombardi mu gihe nyuma y’iminsi itatu, tariki ya 22 Gashyantare 2020, u Butaliyani bwemeje abantu ba mbere bishwe na Coronavirus.
U Butaliyani ni cyo gihugu kimaze kugira abantu benshi bahitanywe n’iki cyorezo cyatangiriye i Wuhan, mu Bushinwa.
Abantu barenga 6820 bamaze gupfa mu Butaliyani bazize Coronavirus mu gihe 2991 ari bo bamaze gupfa muri Espagne.
Umuganga wo muri Bergamo yagarutse ku bitekerezo by’umuyobozi w’ako gace, amushinja amakosa kuri uwo mukino wa Champions League wabaye intandaro y’ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Aganira na Paddy Agnew, umunyamakuru wa Off The Ball, uyu muganga yagize ati “Umwe mu baganga bakuru bo mu bitaro bya Giovanni XXIII i Bergamo yemeza ko [uwo mukino] wari imbarutso y’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo."
“Ibyabaye ni uko abafana ba Atalanta ibihumbi 40 bagendeye hamwe, bajya ku mukino ndetse na nyuma yaho bishimira hamwe mbere yo kujya mu rugo.”
Yongeyeho ati “Icyo batigeze bamenya ni uko benshi muri bo banduye, kubera ko icyo gihe [tariki ya 19 Gashyantare] mu Butaliyani nta muntu wari wagapfuye kubera Coronavirus. Nyuma y’ibyumweru bitatu, abantu 3033 bapfuye mu cyumweru kimwe i Bergamo.”
Kuri ubu ikipe yose ya Atalanta iri mu kato nyuma y’uko umunyezamu Marco Sportiello yanduye coronavirus.
Ni mu gihe mu cyumweru gishize, Valencia yavuze ko abarenga kimwe cya gatatu cy’abakinnyi bayo ndetse n’abatoza, banduye Coronavirus kuva bavuye mu Butaliyani.
Ibikorwa byose by’umupira w’amaguru w’ababigize umwuga mu Burayi byarahagaritswe kubera Coronavirus mu gihe Euro 2020 yimuriwe mu 2021.

Title: Pelé yemeje ko ari we wa mbere ku Isi, anavuga urusha undi hagati ya Cristiano Ronaldo na Messi
Body:
Impaka ku mukinnyi wa mbere ku Isi hagati ya Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi ntiziteze kuzashira hagati y’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru, ariko ku bwa Pelé, asanga kuri ubu Ronaldo ari we uri hejuru.
Impaka ku mukinnyi wa mbere ku Isi hagati ya Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi ntiziteze kuzashira hagati y’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru, ariko ku bwa Pelé, asanga kuri ubu Ronaldo ari we uri hejuru.
Hashize imyaka isaga 10 abantu benshi bibaza ku mukinnyi urusha undi hagati ya Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi, aho aba bombi bamaze gutwara Ballon d’Or 11, zirimo esheshatu za Messi.
Ku bwa Pelé, wabaye umunyabigwi ukomeye mu mupira w’amaguru ubwo yakinaga muri Brésil hagati ya 1956 na 1977, avuga ko Cristiano Ronaldo arusha Messi.
Pelé w’imyaka 79, ngo abishingira ko Ronaldo ubusanzwe atari rutahizamu karemano kandi akaba ahozaho mu kugira ibihe byiza mu kibuga.
Ati “Uyu munsi, umukinnyi mwiza ku Isi ni Cristiano Ronaldo. Ntekerezo ko ari we mukinnyi mwiza kuko ahozaho, ariko na none ntabwo wakwibagirwa Messi, ariko Ronaldo ntabwo ari rutahizamu.”
Muri iki kiganiro yagiranye na Shene ya YouTube ya Pilhado, Pelé yemeje ko bigoye kuvuga umukinnyi w’ibihe byose mu mupira w’amaguru, ariko asanga ntawamuhiga.
Ati “Ni ikibazo gikomeye kugisubiza. Ntabwo twakwibagirwa Zico, Ronaldinho na Ronaldo.”
“Mu Burayi hari Franz Beckenbauer na Yohan Cruyff. Ubu si ikosa ryanjye, ariko nkeka Pelé yari mwiza kurusha abo bose.”
Pelé yavuze ko ameze neza nubwo hari amakuru yaherukaga gutangazwa ko ubuzima bwe bumeze nabi ku buryo adashobora no kujya mu bandi.

Title: Turababaye ariko tugomba kubyakira - Bamwe mu bari guserukira u Rwanda mu mikino ya Tokyo 2020
Body:
Bamwe mu bakinnyi bari kuzahagarira u Rwanda mu mikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 yari kuba mu mpeshyi, hagati ya tariki ya 24 Nyakanga n’iya 9 Kanama mu Buyapani, bavuze ko ku ruhande rumwe bababajwe n’isubikwa ryayo.
Bamwe mu bakinnyi bari kuzahagarira u Rwanda mu mikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 yari kuba mu mpeshyi, hagati ya tariki ya 24 Nyakanga n’iya 9 Kanama mu Buyapani, bavuze ko ku ruhande rumwe bababajwe n’isubikwa ryayo.
Ejo hashize, ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 24 Werurwe 2020, nibwo Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga yatangaje ko imikino ya Tokyo 2020 yasubitswe kugeza mu 2021 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Muri iyo mikino yagombaga kubera mu Buyapani, hari Abanyarwanda bari bamaze kubona itike yayo barimo Muhitira Félicien ‘Magare’ na Hakizimana John basiganwa Marathon.
Hari kandi umukinnyi umwe mu gusiganwa ku magare, wari kuva hagati ya Areruya Joseph, Mugisha Samuel na Munyaneza Didier ndetse n’ikipe y’abagore ya Sitting Volleyball yari gukina mu mikino paralempike.
Muhitira Félicien yabwiye IGIHE ko babajwe no gusubikwa kw’iyi mikino bitewe n’aho bari bageze imyiteguro batangiye muri Muatarama uyu mwaka.
Ati “Ni ibintu umuntu wese w’umukinnyi wari kuzajyayo, atakwishimira. Gukorera ibihe fatizo bitujyanayo ni ibintu byari bivunanye cyane. Twatangiye imyitozo muri Mutarama, imyiteguro yari igeze kure, ariko babihagaritse, nta kundi twabigenza. Ntabwo ari ubushake bwabo ni ikibazo cy’iki cyorezo cyakwiriye ku Isi hose.”
Muhitira yakomeje avuga ko nk’abakinnyi nabo bumva neza impamvu y’isubikwa ry’imikino, kuko icy’ingenzi ari ubuzima bwabo muri iki gihe Isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ati “Turababaye ariko nyine tugomba kubyakira. Ndibaza ko gukina ntabwo aribyo bibanza, habanza ubuzima, tugategereza umwaka utaha bavuze ko bizaba, ukazagera umuntu agifite imbaraga, akiri mu bihe byiza.”
“Komite Olempike yatubwiye ko tugomba guhora twiteguye, tutagomba gusubira inyuma, ku rwego twari tugezeho icyo gihe cyikazagera turi ku rwego rurenze, dufite intego nshya kuko tubonye ikindi gihe cyo kwitegura. “
Hakizimana John na we yavuze ko bari bageze kure imyiteguro, ariko bazakomeza kwitoza mu gihe bategereje igihe iyi mikino ya Tokyo izashyirwaho.
Ati” Ntabwo byadushimishije kuko twari tugeze kure imyiteguro gusa na none ibihe turimo buri wese arabibona kuko Coronavirus iri hose ku Isi, ni ngombwa ko tuyirinda. Ni imyiteguro yari yahagaze.”
Murema Jean Baptiste uyobora Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda ry’imikino y’abafite ubumuga (NPC), yavuze ko icyemezo cyafashwe cyo gusubuka iyi mikino cyari gikwiye.
Ati “Ni icyemezo cyari gikwiriye kuko imikino yasubitswe ku mpamvu zumvikana. Twarimo twitegura [ikipe ya Sitting Vollyeball] ubwo n’umwaka utaha tuzakomeza imyiteguro nitumara kumenyeshwa ko nta kibazo kuko ubu murabizi ko byose byahagaze.”
Mukundiyukuri Jean de Dieu ushinzwe guhuza ibikorwa bya Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda, yabwiye IGIHE ko nubwo imikino ya Tokyo 2020 yashyizwe umwaka utaha, bazakomeza gufasha abakinnyi kwitegura.
Ati “Twari twishatsemo ubushobozi kugira ngo bitegure imikino. Batangiye mu kwa mbere, inkunga twari twabaye yari kugeza muri Nyakanga. Nubwo imikino yasubitswe ntabwo IOC [Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga] iratubwira ikiza gukurikiraho, ariko twe tuzakomeza gufasha abakinnyi bazagere igihe cy’imikino bahagaze neza.”
Mukundiyukuri yavuze ko kandi bazakomeza gufasha n’ikipe ya Beach Volleyball y’abagore iri gushaka itike yo kuzitabira imikino Olempike ya Tokyo.
Ubwo imikino ya Tokyo 2020 yasubikwaga kubera Coronavirus, abagera kuri 57% ni bo bari bamaze kubona itike yayo mu gihe indi myanya ingana na 43% yari igihatanirwa.

Title: Cristiano Ronaldo, Messi na Guardiola mu byamamare byatanze inkunga yo kurwanya Coronavirus
Body:
Mu gihe umubare w’abandura icyorezo cyo Coronavirus ukomeje kwiyongera mu bice byose by’Isi, bamwe mu bakinnyi n’abatoza bakomeye bakomeje kugaragaza umutima wa kimuntu batanga inkunga yo gufasha kurwanya iyo ndwara.
Mu gihe umubare w’abandura icyorezo cyo Coronavirus ukomeje kwiyongera mu bice byose by’Isi, bamwe mu bakinnyi n’abatoza bakomeye bakomeje kugaragaza umutima wa kimuntu batanga inkunga yo gufasha kurwanya iyo ndwara.
Imibare iheruka gutangazwa, igaragaza ko abamaze kwandura Coronavirus ku Isi yose basaga ibihumbi 420 mu gihe abasaga ibihumbi 18 bamaze guhitanwa nayo.
Umutoza wa Manchester City, Umunya-Espagne, Pep Guardiola ari mu bafite izina rikomeye mu mupira w’amaguru, wafashe iya mbere mu gufasha igihugu cye cyugarijwe n’icyo cyorezo, aho abasaga 2600 bamaze gupfa naho abagera ku bihumbi 40 bakaba baranduye.
Pep Guardiola kuri ubu uri iwe mu rugo muri Barcelone, yatanze miliyoni 1€ (asaga miliyari 1 na miliyoni 12 Frw) ku nzego z’ubuzima muri Espagne kugira ngo babashe guhangana na Coronavirus.
Iyi nkunga izajya mu Kigo cy’ubuzima cya Barcelone ndetse na Angel Soler Daniel Foundation.
Undi watanze inkunga yo gufasha kurwanya Coronavirus ni rutahizamu wa FC Barcelone, Lionel Messi.
Mundo Deportivo yatangaje ko Messi yatanze miliyoni 1€ ku bitaro bibiri, bimwe byo muri Barcelone ndetse n’ibindi byo muri Argentine, aho avuka.
Rutahizamu wa Juventus, Cristiano Ronaldo afatanyije na Jorge Mendes uharanira inyungu ze, batanze miliyoni 1€ ku bigo bitatu biri kwita ku banduye Coronavirus mu bitaro byo mu Mujyi wa Lisbon n’uwa Porto muri Portugal.
Mu cyumweru gishize, rutahizamu wa Bayern Munich, Rober Lewandowski afatanyije n’umugore we, Anna, batanze miliyoni 1€ yo kurwanya Coronavirus mu Budage.
Leroy Sane wa Manchester City, Leon Goretzka na Joshua Kimmich ba Bayern Munich, na bo batanze inkunga yo kurwanya icyo cyorezo mu Budage.
Umutoza wa Tottenham, José Mourinho, yatanze ibyo kurya ku basaza bo mu Mujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza, baheze mu rugo kubera Coronavirus.

Title: Gasingwa Michel yahakanye ruswa mu basifuzi bo mu Rwanda, yemeza ko amakosa bakora asanzwe
Body:
Gasingwa Michel ukuriye Komisiyo y’abasifuzi b’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, yahakanye ibya ruswa ivugwa mu basifuzi ndetse yemeza ko hari byinshi bikwiriye kwitabwaho kugira ngo imisifurire yo mu Rwanda igendane n’igihe tugezemo birimo kongerera abasifuzi ubushobozi.
Gasingwa Michel ukuriye Komisiyo y’abasifuzi b’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, yahakanye ibya ruswa ivugwa mu basifuzi ndetse yemeza ko hari byinshi bikwiriye kwitabwaho kugira ngo imisifurire yo mu Rwanda igendane n’igihe tugezemo birimo kongerera abasifuzi ubushobozi.
Kuva Shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda itangiye mu Ukwakira 2019, hamaze guhagarikwa abasifuzi barindwi ndetse bane muri bo, bahagaritswe muri uku kwezi kwa Werurwe 2020.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA, Gasingwa Michel ukuriye Komisiyo y’Imisufirire muri FERWAFA, yasobanuye ko impamvu zituma amakosa agaragara cyane muri iyi minsi ari iterambere rya ruhago rigenda rikora ku mpande nyinshi harimo n’itangazamakuru.
Yavuze ko kandi ubumenyi ku mupira w’amaguru bwiyongera, gusa ngo kuri we, amakosa ari gukorwa n’abasifuzi muri iyi minsi arasanzwe.
Ati "Aya makosa arasanzwe. Ntabwo ari ubumenyi buke bw’abasifuzi ahubwo hari n’ubwo umusifuzi aramuka nabi kumwe nk’uko biba ku basifuzi b’abahanga tumenyereye i Burayi. Usibye twe kandi n’umukinnyi hari igihe aramuka nabi icyo kintu akanakimarana iminsi.”
“Gusifura si siyansi nk’ imibare bigenda bizamuka bigendanye n’ubunararibonye bw’ubikora."
Abajijwe impamvu muri iyi minsi hari guhanwa abasifuzi benshi cyane, Gasingwa yavuze ko no mu yindi myaka ari uko byahoze, ahubwo itandukaniro ari uko ubu bisigaye bitangazwa.
Ati "Na mbere abasifuzi barahanwaga, icyahindutse ni uku ubu dusigaye tubitangaza, itangazamakuru rikabimenya bitandukanye na mbere. Ikoranabuhanga iwacu hano ryarakataje ku buryo bihita bigera kuri benshi mu gihe gito, naho ubundi nta byacitse."
Ku bijyanye na ruswa ivugwa ku basifuzi, uyu muyobozi yabihakanye, avuga ko kugeza ubu bagikomeje kubikurikirana ariko nta cyemeza ko bihari.
Ati "Ibyo ntiturabibona ariko dukomeza gukurikirana niba nta byaba biturangwamo."
Yavuze ko umusifuzi yigishwa, agategurwa ndetse agakosorwa (igihe yakosheje) akanahugurwa bigendanye n’amategeko mashya agenda ahinduka.
Ati "Abasifuzi barategurwa bakanazamurwa mu ntera bitewe n’ubumenyi bahabwa. Icyo nsaba ni uko iki kibazo batakigira icya Gasingwa, FERWAFA cyangwa undi wundi. Ndibutsa amakipe ko ariyo FERWAFA ndetse umupira w’amaguru udakwiye gutera imbere ngo usige abasifuzi. Nibabiteho, babagenere ibibakwiriye (ubumenyi n’ubushishozi).”
“Umupira w’amaguru wajemo amafaranga menshi ni nako urwego rugenda ruzamuka. Rero be gusiga inyuma abasifuzi."
Umusifuzi wo mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda ahabwa ibihumbi 19 Frw ku mukino.
Kuri iki kibazo kandi cy’ubushobozi, Gasingwa avuga ko benshi mu basifuzi mpuzamahanga bafite indi mirimo bakora bikaba imbogamuzi ku mikino ikinwa hagati mu cyumweru, ntibaboneke ku mikino imwe yahuje amakipe akomeye.
Tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Shampiyona y’u Rwanda yahagaze by’agateganyo igeze ku munsi wa 24 mu gihe u Rwanda n’Isi yose muri rusange byiyemeje guhagarika ibikorwa byose bihuza abantu benshi nk’imwe mu ngamba zo guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Title: Musanze FC yavuze ku makuru avuga ko umutoza wayo yanduye Coronavirus
Body:
Ikipe ya Musanze FC yatangaje ko amakuru avugwa ko umutoza wayo mukuru w’Umunya-Misiri, Ahmed Abdelrahman Ibrahim Adel, yanduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus nta shingiro afite.
Ikipe ya Musanze FC yatangaje ko amakuru avugwa ko umutoza wayo mukuru w’Umunya-Misiri, Ahmed Abdelrahman Ibrahim Adel, yanduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus nta shingiro afite.
Abdelrahman Ibrahim Adel yagizwe umutoza wa Musanze FC tariki ya 2 Ukuboza 2019, asimbuye Umurundi Niyongabo Amars wari umaze iminsi itanu yirukanywe.
Ubwo Shampiyona n’ibindi bikorwa byose bihuza abantu benshi byari bimaze guhagarikwa mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe, Ahmed Adel yasubiye iwabo mu karuhuko gato.
Uyu mugabo w’Umunya-Misiri yagarutse mu Rwanda kuwa Kane w’icyumweru gishize, tariki ya 19 Werurwe, ari nabwo hatangiye kuvugwa ko yaba yaranduye Coronavirus.
Ibinyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Musanze FC yanyomoje ayo makuru, ivuga ko nta shingiro afite.
Ati “Turabamenyesha ko ibihuha bimaze iminsi bivugwa ko umutoza mukuru Ahmed Adel yanduye Covid-19 nta shingiro bifite kandi bibogamye. Ameze neza kandi afite umutekano, ari mu rugo.”
We would like to let you know that the rumors that have been circulating lately that the Head coach Ahmed Adel has been infected by #Coronavid19 are unfounded and totally biased. He's safe and sound and he's staying home @FERWAFA @Radiorwanda_RBA pic.twitter.com/V9DgwMtRrQ
— Musanze fc (@musanzefc) March 24, 2020
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Musanze FC, Makuza Rutishereka Jean, yabwiye IGIHE ko Ahmed Adel yapimwe n’inzego zishinzwe ubuzima zigasanga ataranduye Coronavirus.
Ati “Nyuma yo kugera hano avuye mu Misiri aho yari yajyanye n’umwungirije [we wasigayeyo], tariki ya 20 Werurwe [Ku wa Gatanu] ababishinzwe baje kumureba mu rugo bamujyana mu bitaro bikuru bya Ruhengeri baramupima, ibizamini babyohereza i Kigali. Yahamaze ijoro rimwe, ibisubizo bye byaje tariki ya 21 Werurwe bigaragaza ko ari muzima, baramureka arataha.”
Kuva ageze muri Musanze FC, Ahmed Adel amaze gutoza iyi kipe mu mikino 12, ayihesha amanota 18 ndetse Shampiyona yahagaze iri ku mwanya wa 11 n’amanota 27 mu mikino 24.

Title: APR FC yahakanye ibyo gutandukana n’umutoza Nabyl Bekraoui
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa APR FC bwanyomoje amakuru avugwa ko yamaze gutandukana n’umutoza wayo wungirije, Naby Bekraoui, butangaza ko nta shingiro afite kuko uyu mutoza akiri mu Rwanda ndetse akomeje inshingano afite mu ikipe y’ingabo.
Ubuyobozi bwa APR FC bwanyomoje amakuru avugwa ko yamaze gutandukana n’umutoza wayo wungirije, Naby Bekraoui, butangaza ko nta shingiro afite kuko uyu mutoza akiri mu Rwanda ndetse akomeje inshingano afite mu ikipe y’ingabo.
Hashize iminsi havugwa ko umutoza mukuru wa APR FC, Adil Mohamed Erradi atumvikana n’umwungirije, Nabyl Bekraoui ndetse uyu mutoza mukuru yahisemo ko Bekaroui yagenda, akishakira undi umwungiriza.
Itangazo rigenewe abanyamakuru ryashyizwe hanze n’Umuvugizi wa APR FC, Kazungu Claver, kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 24 Werurwe 2020, rinyomoza iby’uko iyi kipe yamaze gutandukana na Bekraoui.
Rigira riti” Ubuyobozi bwa APR FC buranyomoza ibihuha byatangajwe na Radio imwe yavuze ko Umutoza wungurije wa APR FC, Nabyl Bekraoui, yamaze kwirukanwa ngo kandi akaba adahari mu Rwanda yaragiye iwabo.”
“Ibi ni ibintu bitari ibya kinyamwuga kuko ntabwo babanje kubaza ubuyobozi bwa APR FC. Abatoza batatu barimo Hassan Haj Taleb waje guhugura abatoza b’abanyezamu bose barahari mu Rwanda.”
Aganira na IGIHE, Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa APR FC, Lt. Col. Sekaramba Sylvestre yavuze ko Nabyl Bekraoui akiri umutoza wa APR FC kuko amasezerano ye azarangirana n’umwaka w’imikino.
Yakomeje avuga ko abavuga ko abatoza ba APR FC batumvikana, atazi aho babikura kuko umutoza mukuru ari we wizaniye umwungiriza.
Ati “Ntaho yagiye kandi aracyari umutoza wa APR. Afite amasezerano kandi yasinye umwaka. Ibyo [by’umwuka mubi hagati y’abatoza] sinzi aho babivana. Umutoza mukuru ni we wazanye umwungirije kandi babanye neza. Ni ko kuri.”
Mu gihe ibikorwa by’imikino bimaze iminsi bihagaritswe mu Rwanda kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, APR FC ni yo ya mbere muri Shampiyona n’amanota 57 mu mikino 23 imaze gukina mu gihe mu Gikombe cy’Amahoro 2020, izahura na Kiyovu Sports muri 1/8.

Title: Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 yasubitswe
Body:
Abashinzwe gutegura imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020, bemeranyijwe ko isubikwa umwaka umwe, ikazaba mu mwaka utaha wa 2021 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Abashinzwe gutegura imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020, bemeranyijwe ko isubikwa umwaka umwe, ikazaba mu mwaka utaha wa 2021 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo yagombaga kuba hagati ya tariki ya 24 Nyakanga n’iya 9 Kanama 2020.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Minisiteri w’Intebe w’u Buyapani, Shinzo Abe, yavuze ko yaganiriye n’Umuyobozi wa Komite Olempike Mpuzamahaga, Thomas Bach, bakemeranywa ko imikino isubikwa.
Ati “Nsabye ko imikino yakwigizwa inyuma umwaka ndetse Perezida [wa IOC] Thomas Bach yabyemeye 100%.”
Minisitiri w’Intebe Shinzo Abe, yatangaje ibi nyuma y’iminsi ibiri Komite Nyobozi ya IOC iteranye ku Cyumweru tariki ya 22 Werurwe, aho yari yemeje ko umwanzuro wa nyuma ku mikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 uzatangazwa mu byumweru bine biri imbere.
Umwe mu bagize IOC, Dick Pound, yari yatangaje ko iyi mikino izasubikwa kugeza mu 2021.
Ibihugu bitandukanye ku Isi byari bimaze iminsi bisaba ko iyi mikino yasubikwa kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritswe amarushanwa yose arimo n’ayo gushaka itike ya Tokyo 2020.
Canada na Australia ni byo bihugu byari bimaze gutangaza ko bitazajya mu mikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 mu gihe u Bwongereza nabwo bwari bwatangaje ko bufata icyo cyemezo.
Mu Cyumweru gishize, Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga yari yatangaje ko abagera kuri 57% ari bo bamaze kubona itike yo kwitabira imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020.
Muri abo 57% harimo Abanyarwanda batatu bamaze kubona itike mu gusiganwa ku maguru no mu mukino w’Amagare.

Title: Siporo abantu bashobora gukorera mu ngo zabo muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus
Body:
Kimwe no mu bindi bihugu bitari bike ku Isi, mu Rwanda abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’ubwandu bw’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Kimwe no mu bindi bihugu bitari bike ku Isi, mu Rwanda abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’ubwandu bw’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Nubwo abenshi bagerageza gushaka ibibarangaza mu masaha yose bamara mu ngo zabo, akenshi usanga bitaborohera kumara umwanya munini baryamye, bareba filimi, Televiziyo cyangwa ibindi bishobora gutuma batagira irungu.
Hari kandi n’abari basanzwe bamenyereye gukora siporo zitandukanye buri munsi kugira ngo umubiri wabo ukomeza kumera neza, ariko kuri ubu bakaba badashobora kubikora nk’uko byari bisanzwe kubera ibi bihe bidasanzwe byashyizweho.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Mukasa Nelson usanzwe ari umutoza w’imyitozo ngororamubiri, yavuze ko hari siporo abantu bashobora gukorera mu ngo zikabafasha kwirinda amavunane aterwa no kumara igihe kinini mu buriri ndetse no kubyibuha cyane bitewe n’uko birirwa hamwe.
Muri siporo Mukasa agira abari mu ngo zabo harimo gusimbuka umugozi mu rugo, gukora imyitozo yo kunanura umungongo cyangwa guterura.
Ati "Abo mu rugo bashobora gufashanya, burya siporo ituma umuntu atigunga, ababyeyi n’abana bagakorera hamwe. Umwe mu bagize umuryango ashobora kuba umutoza.”
Mukasa avuga ko nk’abafite ubushobozi bwo kubona amashusho y’imyitozo ngororangingo kuri Internet, “Bashobora kuyashyira kuri Televiziyo bakagendana n’abari kuyikora iminota nka 40, barangiza bagakora imyitozo yo kunanura umugongo indi minota nka 10, bakananura imitsi iminota nk’itanu, ubundi bakoga.”
“Bifasha umubiri wawe gukomeza kumera neza, ukirinda umubyibuho. Udakoze siporo muri ibi bihe ushobora kwiyongera ibiro. Ni ukugerageza gukorera mu rugo kuko ni ngombwa.”
Mu gihe abantu bakurikiza amabwiriza yo kuguma mu rugo, ni ngombwa no kuzirikana ko Siporo ari ubuzima.

Title: Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 ishobora kwigizwa inyuma
Body:
Umwe mu bagize Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga, Dick Poun, yavuze ko imikino Olempike ya 2020 yari kubera i Tokyo guhera tariki ya 24 Nyakanga kugeza ku ya 9 Kanama, izasubikwa umwaka umwe, ikaba mu 2021 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwe mu bagize Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga, Dick Poun, yavuze ko imikino Olempike ya 2020 yari kubera i Tokyo guhera tariki ya 24 Nyakanga kugeza ku ya 9 Kanama, izasubikwa umwaka umwe, ikaba mu 2021 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ibi yabitangaje kuwa Mbere tariki ya 23 Werurwe 2020, nyuma y’uko Komite Olempike mu Bwongereza itangaje ko itazohereza abakinnyi i Tokyo mu mpeshyi.
Australia na Canada ni ibindi bihugu byatangaje ko bitazitabira iyi mikino ya Tokyo 2020 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Dick Pound yabwiye USA Today ko hashingiwe ku makuru Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga ifite, imikino ya Tokyo 2020 izasubikwa.
Ati "Hashingiwe ku makuru IOC ifite, hafashwe icyemezo cyo gusubika imikino."
"Ibipimo biri gukorwa ntabwo bigaragaza uko mu minsi iri imbere bizaba bimeze, ariko imikino ntabwo izatangira tariki ya 24 Nyakanga.”
Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga yihaye ibyumweru bine kugira ngo ifate umwanzuro ku hazaza h’imikino yo mu mpeshyi, ariko umunyamuryango wayo w’inararibonye, Dick Pound, avuga ko icyemezo kizatangazwa vuba.
Ati "Bizaza mu byiciro. Tuzayisubika ubundi dutangire guhangana n’ingaruka zose zo kwimura ibindi byinshi."
Umuyobozi wa Komite Olempike mu Bwongereza, Hugh Robertson, yavuze ko na bo bateganya gutera ikirenge mu cya Australia na Canada.
Ati "Ntibuna uburyo ishobora gukomeza dukurikije uko ibintu bimeze. Ndizera ko vuba aha tuzifatanya na Canada na Australia.”
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Mbere, habarurwaga abantu basaga ibihumbi 370 banduye Coronavirus.
Perezida w’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’imikino ngororamubiri ku Isi, Lord Coe, na we yasabye ko imikino Olempike izabera muri Tokyo yasubikwa.

Title: Kutumvikana n’abayobozi batangiranye mu byatunguye Munyakazi Sadate muri Rayon Sports
Body:
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, yavuze ko bimwe mu byamutunguye mu mezi umunani amaze ku buyobozi bwayo harimo kuba yaratengushywe na bamwe mu bayobozi batangiranye ntibumvikane.
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, yavuze ko bimwe mu byamutunguye mu mezi umunani amaze ku buyobozi bwayo harimo kuba yaratengushywe na bamwe mu bayobozi batangiranye ntibumvikane.
Munyakazi yatorewe kuyobora Rayon Sports muri Nyakanga 2019, asimbuye Muvunyi Paul wari umaze imyaka ibiri ayobora iyi kipe.
Mu kiganiro uyu muyobozi yagiranye na Radio 10 kuri uyu wa bere tariki ya 23 Werurwe 2020, yavuze ko kimwe mu byamutunguye mu mezi umunani amaze muri Rayon Sports harimo kuba atarumvikanye na bamwe mu bayobozi batangiranye.
Yagize ati “Ikintu cyantunguye kandi ntari niteguye ni ukutumvikana n’abayobozi twatangiranye. Byarantunguye biranambabaza kuko ninjye wari wagize uruhare mu kubishakira ngo tuzafatanye. Kuba tutarumvikanye byarambabaje.”
Bamwe mu bari abayobozi ba Rayon Sports barimo Twagirayezu Thaddée wari Visi Perezida wa mbere; Muhirwa Prosper wari Visi Perezida wa Kabiri na Rutagambwa Martin wari Umujyanama wihariye wa Munyakazi Sadate, bose ntibakiri muri iyo myanya.
Munyakazi yavuze ko ikindi cyamutunguye ari icyizere abafana ba Rayon Sports basigaye bagirira ubuyobozi n’ikipe muri rusange kabone nubwo yaba yatsinzwe.
Ati “Nkijya ku buyobozi abantu barambwiye bati muri Rayon Sports iyo utsinzwe rimwe, abafana igihano baguha ni ukutagaruka ku kibuga ariko twaratsinzwe nka Komite, si na rimwe cyangwa kabiri, ariko ntabwo batuvuye inyuma. Nyuma yo gutsindwa na Sunrise, baraduherekeje i Rubavu. Imyumvire yabo imaze guhinduka. Bazi neza ko tugomba gufatanya.”
Munyakazi yavuze ko igihe amaze ku buyobozi kitari cyoroshye bitewe n’impinduka zabubayemo n’ihindagurika ry’abatoza, aho nyuma yo gutandukana na Olivier Ovambe, Robertinho na Javier Martinez Espinoza, kuri ubu ikipe itozwa na Cassa Mbungo André.
Ubwo imikino yahagarikwaga tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, Rayon Sports yari ku mwanya wa kabiri muri Shampiyona n’amanota 51 mu mikino 24, irushwa amanota atandatu na APR FC ya mbere, yo ifite ikirarane izakina na Espoir FC.
Rayon Sports kandi izahura kandi na Mukura Victory Sports mu mikino ibiri ya 1/8 cy’Igikombe cy’Amahoro 2020.

Title: Stade z’umupira w’amaguru muri Brésil zigiye guhindurwamo ibitaro by’abanduye Coronavirus
Body:
Amakipe akomeye muri Brésil ari gutanga Stade zayo kugira ngo abashinzwe ubuzima bazihinduremo ibitaro bikuru n’amavuriro mato yita ku barwayi bafashwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Amakipe akomeye muri Brésil ari gutanga Stade zayo kugira ngo abashinzwe ubuzima bazihinduremo ibitaro bikuru n’amavuriro mato yita ku barwayi bafashwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Imibare yo kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 23 Werurwe 2020, yashyizwe ahagaragara na Kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins yo muri Amerika, ivuga ko abantu 1546 aribo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus muri Brésil mu gihe 25 bahitanywe n’icyo cyorezo.
Mu gihe umupira w’amaguru muri icyo gihugu wahagaritswe kugeza igihe hatangiwe andi mabwiriza, arenga kimwe cya kabiri cy’amakipe 20 yo mu cyiciro cya mbere muri Brésil yamaze gutanga Stade zayo mu gihe abayobozi bo muri Sao Paolo na Rio de Janeiro bashaka kwagura ubushobozi bw’ibitaro mu rwego rwo guhangana n’icyo cyorezo.
Ikipe ya Flamengo yatwaye Shampiyona iheruka muri Brésil, yemeje ko yamaze gushyikiriza Stade yayo ya Maracanã abayobozi bashinzwe ubuzima muri Rio de Janeiro.
Perezida wayo, Rodolfo Landim, yagize ati “Muri ibi bihe bibi, nifuzaga gutumira abantu bacu mu mabara y’umutuku n’umukara kugira ibyiringiro no kugira iminsi myiza. Reka twite ku basaza bacu, dufashe ababikeneye cyane."
Abayobozi bo muri Sao Paulo, umujyi munini wa Brésil, bavuze ko bazashyira ibitanda 200 mu bitaro byo muri Stade ya Pacaembu Municipale kugira ngo bagabanye ubucucike n’igitutu ku bitaro byo muri uwo mujyi mu gihe andi makipe abiri akomeye, nayo yemeye gutanga ibibuga byayo.
Corinthians Paulista na yo yatangaje ko yatanze Stade yayo ya Itaquerao n’ikibuga cyayo cy’imyitozo kugira ngo abashinzwe ubuzima barebe uko babikoresha mu kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’ubwandu bwa Coronavirus.
Ikipe ya Santos yatangaje ko ibitaro by’agateganyo bizubakwa mu nzu imwe iri muri stade ya Vila Belmiro.
Ku wa Gatanu, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Luiz Henrique Mandetta, yagaragaje ko Coronavirus ishobora kuzagera ku rwego rwo hejuru muri Brésil hagati ya Mata na Kamena mu gihe ateganya ko umubare w’abafashwe n’iyi ndwara ya COVID-19 uzagabanuka guhera muri Nzeri 2020.
Mandetta yaburiye abashinzwe ubuzima muri icyo gihugu gituwe n’abatuye miliyoni 210, ko imibare ishobora kwiyongera cyane muri Mata.

Title: Rayon Sports igiye gusinyana na Airtel amasezerano y’imikoranire y’imyaka itanu
Body:
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports na Sosiyete y’itumanaho ya Airtel bagiye kugirana amasezerano y’ubufatanye azamara igihe cy’imyaka itanu, aho yitezweho gufasha impande zombi nyuma yo gusanga hari icyo buri ruhande ruzabyungukiramo.
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports na Sosiyete y’itumanaho ya Airtel bagiye kugirana amasezerano y’ubufatanye azamara igihe cy’imyaka itanu, aho yitezweho gufasha impande zombi nyuma yo gusanga hari icyo buri ruhande ruzabyungukiramo.
Muri Kamena 2018 nibwo Rayon Sports na Airtel zagiranye amasezerano y’ubufatanye yagombaga kumara amezi atandatu mu rwego rwo gusuzuma imikoranire ishoboka hagati y’impande zombi.
Icyo gihe impande zombi zemeranyije ishyirwaho ry’ipaki zihariye zitiriwe Rayon Sports, umuntu uziguze hakagira amafaranga ashyikirizwa iyi kipe.
Iyo paki ya ‘Rayon Pack’ yagurwaga binyuze kuri *699# (mbere yo kwimurirwa kuri *456#), yinjirije Rayon Sports agera kuri miliyoni 4 Frw nk’uko byemejwe n’umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, watangarije Radio 10 ko ubu bagiye gusinya andi masezerano y’imyaka itanu kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 22 Werurwe 2020.
Ati “Uyu munsi turaza gusinyana na Airtel andi masezerano y’imyaka itanu. Kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ndasinya ayo masezerano ubundi nyoherereze Airtel nayo iyasinye iyohereze. Turaza gutangaza ibizaba biyakubiyemo.”
Rayon Sports ni yo kipe ikunzwe n’abantu benshi mu Rwanda, mu gihe imibare y’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA, yo muri Gashyantare 2020, igaragaza ko muri miliyoni 9,6 z’abakoresha telefoni mu Rwanda, Airtel ifitemo miliyoni 4.2.

Title: Canada na Australia byikuye mu mikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020
Body:
Ibihugu bya Canada na Australia byatangaje ko bitazitabira imikino Olempike ya 2020 izabera i Tokyo mu Buyapani bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Ibihugu bya Canada na Australia byatangaje ko bitazitabira imikino Olempike ya 2020 izabera i Tokyo mu Buyapani bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Mu itangazo Komite Olempike yayo yashyize hanze, Canada yabaye igihugu cya mbere cyatangaje ko kitakitabiriye iyo mikino kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Australia na yo yabwiye abakinnyi bayo gutangira kwitegura imikino ya 2021 kuko bigoye ko iya 2020 izaba.
Imikino Olempike ya Tokyo iteganyijwe kuba hagati ya tariki ya 24 Nyakanga n’iya 9 Kanama 2020
Ibihugu byombi byafashe uyu mwanzuro mu gihe Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga iri gutekeza uburyo imikino Olempike ya Tokyo 2020 yasubikwa, ndetse yihaye ibyumweru bine ubundi igafata umwanzuro wa nyuma.
Inama y’ubuyobozi ya Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga yateranye ku Cyumweru tariki ya 22 Werurwe nyuma y’uko ikomeje gushyirwaho igitutu n’abakinnyi na za Komite Olempike yo zo mu bihugu bitandukanye, zisaba ko imikino yasubikwa kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na IOC nyuma y’iyo nama, rivuga ko yize ku buryo imikino yaba, aho bishoboka ko amatariki yari kuberaho yahinduka.
Yagize iti "Dukurikije uko ku Isi yose bikomeje kugenda bihinduka..Ubuyobozi bukuru uyu munsi bwatangije intambwe ikurikira mu igenamigambi rya Komite Olempike Mpuzamahanga."
"Ibi bifitanye isano no guhindura gahunda zisanzwe zikoreshwa mu mikino izakomeza tariki ya 24 Nyakanga 2020, ndetse no guhindura umunsi wo gutangiraho imikino."
IOC yavuze ko guhagarika imikino "bitari ku murongo w’ibyigwa", ariko na none hazasuzumwa niba ishobora kwigizwa inyuma.
Ibihugu byinshi bikomeje gusaba ko iyi mikino yakwigizwa inyuma amezi menshi cyangwa umwaka wose kuko kugeza ubu imikino n’ibindi bikorwa byahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Buyapani, Shinzo Abe, yavuze ko gusubika iyi mikino ubu bishoboka cyane, kuko bigoye ko yagenda uko yateguwe kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19.

Title: Uko Rayon Sports yinjiza amafaranga, umwenda wa SKOL n’imikoranire n’abafatanyabikorwa
Body:
Rayon Sports ifite abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye barimo n’uruganda rwenga ibinyobwa rwa SKOL, ikoresha agera kuri miliyoni 32 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe 90% by’ayo mafaranga atangwa n’abakunzi b’iyi kipe gusa.
Rayon Sports ifite abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye barimo n’uruganda rwenga ibinyobwa rwa SKOL, ikoresha agera kuri miliyoni 32 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe 90% by’ayo mafaranga atangwa n’abakunzi b’iyi kipe gusa.
Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, yavuze ko abafana bayo bagira uruhare runini mu gufasha iyi kipe kubaho, mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio 10 kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 23 Werurwe 2020.
Muri icyo kiganiro, Munyakazi yavuze ko Rayon Sports yakoresheje agera kuri miliyoni 140 Frw mu kugura abakinnyi no kongerera amasezerano abari basanzwe mu ikipe mbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20 utangira, ariko yemeza ko hari abakinnyi batarishyurwa ibyo bagombwa.
Ati “Rayon Spots ibayeho mu buryo bumwe no mu bundi, ibayeho nk’andi makipe. Igira ibyo isohora, kuva itegura umukinnyi kugeza ageze mu kibuga. Twe tumaze kugura abakinnyi 19, barimo abongereye amasezerano n’abashyashya. Byatudwaye hafi miliyoni 140 Frw nubwo yose tutarayishyura, hari abakinnyi bamwe tukiyafitiye.”
Perezida wa Rayon Sports yavuze ko ibikorwa byose iyi kipe igira buri kwezi birimo kwitegura imikino, imodoka y’ikipe n’ibindi ikora bitwara hafi miliyoni 32 Frw ku kwezi.
Ati “Dukenera amafaranga y’ingendo, ay’imyitozo, imyambaro y’imyitozo, imishahara y’abakinnyi, abatoza, abaganga n’abandi bakorana tutibagiwe n’abandi bakozi b’ikipe. Ikipe ikenera gukora umwiherero kugira ngo ishyire umutima ku mukino, kandi iwukora iminsi ibiri.”
“Ibyo byose bidufata hafi milyoni 32 Frw ku kwezi. Imodoka yacu inywa ibihumbi 50 Frw ku munsi, iyo twagiye mu ntara nk’i Rubavu bidutwara hafi ibihumbi 200 Frw.”
Amafaranga Rayon Sports ikoresha ava he?
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, yavuze ko ubwo hakorwaga inama y’Inteko Rusange muri Mutarama, basanze barakoresheje milyoni 350 Frw mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu ndetse 90% y’ayo, akaba yaratanzwe n’abafana.
Abafana ngo bagira uruhare mu gufasha ikipe binyuze ku matike bagura bagiye ku mikino yakiriye, inkunga batanga binyuze muri za Fan Club ndetse no kwitanga ku giti cyabo.
Ati “90% y’icyo twatungishije ikipe, byavuye mu bakunzi bayo. Mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu, twakoresheje asaga miliyoni 350 Frw ngendeye ku mibare twaboneye mu Nteko Rusange. Miliyoni 30 Frw yavuye mu bafatanyabikorwa, ayandi ni mu bafana. Tuyakura ku bibuga, ku mikino twakiriye.”
“Andi mafaranga ni umusanzu abafana batanga binyuze muri za Fan club, aho ubu ku kwezi batanga miliyoni 5 Frw. Hejuru y’ayo ngayo hari abakunzi banyuranye bitanga, abo nabo bagira uruhare mu gutera inkunga ikipe.”
Rayon Sports yamaze kwishyura umwenda wa SKOL
Munyakazi Sadate yavuze ko ubwo yagirwaga umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports mu mezi umunani ashize, nta mafaranga bigeze babona avuye ku muterankunga wayo mukuru, SKOL, bitewe n’umwenda wa miliyoni 36 Frw ikipe yari yarafashe.
Yemeje ko uwo mwenda wamaze kwishyurwa ndetse ubu bashobora kongera kubona amafaranga asigaye muri uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20.
Ati “Ku mufatanyabikorwa mukuru SKOL, navuga ko mu masezerano ahari yakabaye iha Rayon Sports miliyoni 66 Frw ku mwaka, imyambaro twambara iha agaciro ka miliyoni 20 Frw, ikibuga cy’imyotozo n’amacumbi tudakoresha.”
“Twasanze hari ideni rya miliyoni 33 Frw Rayon Sports yafashe muri SKOL. Twagombaga kuryishyura, bivuze ko amafaranga twagombaga kubona muri SKOL, tuyishyura mu myenda. Iryo deni ryamaze kwishyurwa, ubu ahubwo turi kuyibaza amafaranga asigaye (miliyoni 33) kuri uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/2020.”
Rayon Sports igira impuzandengo ya miliyoni 5 Frw ku mukino, mu mikino ihuriramo n’amakipe atari mu atanu akomeye mu Rwanda, aho ishobora kwinjiza miliyoni 10 Frw mu mikino ibiri yakiriye mu kwezi kuko hari n’indi iba igomba gukinira hanze.
Abandi bafatanyabikorwa ba Rayon Sports batanga ibingana iki?
Perezida wa Rayon Sports yavuze ko nta kintu baratangira kubona ku bandi batanyabikorwa b’ikipe barimo Ritco, MoGas, Gas Oil, Airtel n’abandi kuko bari bakiri mu igerageza ryo kureba niba hari icyo na bo bakwinjiza mu gihe Radiant yahaye iyi kipe miliyoni 14 Frw mu mwaka ushize naho Airtel igatanga hafi miliyoni 4 Frw.
Ati “ Statisiyo na Ritco binyuze muri MK Card byari nk’igerageza, abenshi ntacyo baraduhaho, ariko twari tumaze kuvugana ko guhera uku kwezi bagira icyo batangira kuduha, ariko hajemo icyorezo cya Coronavirus.”
Mu cyumweru gishize, Rayon Sports yatangiye ubukangurambaga bwo gushishikariza abafana bayo gukusanya amafaranga yo kugoboka ikipe yabo ndetse kuri ubu bamaze gutanga asaga miliyoni 2.6 Frw muri miliyoni 20 Frw zisabwa kugira ngo ihembe ukwezi kwa Gashyantare.

Title: Uwasifuye umukino Rayon Sports yanganyijemo na Gicumbi FC yahagaritswe
Body:
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) ryafashe icyemezo guhagarika umusifuzi wo hagati, Ngaboyisonga Patrick, wasifuye umukino w’umunsi wa 24 wa Shampiyona Rayon Sports yanganyijemo na Gicumbi FC igitego 1-1.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) ryafashe icyemezo guhagarika umusifuzi wo hagati, Ngaboyisonga Patrick, wasifuye umukino w’umunsi wa 24 wa Shampiyona Rayon Sports yanganyijemo na Gicumbi FC igitego 1-1.
Muri uwo mukino wabaye tariki ya 14 Werurwe 2020, Rayon Sports yishyuye igitego kitavuzweho rumwe, mu minota y’inyongera nyuma y’uko Sugira Ernest yabanje kugonga umunyezamu Mbarushimana Emile, bigaha icyuho Niyonzima Ally agatsinda.
Komisiyo y’imisifurire yasanze umusifuzi Ngaboyisonga Patrick yarakoze amakosa yo kwemeza igitego kandi yari yegereye ahabereye ikosa, imuhanisha guhagarikwa ibyumweru bine adasifura.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa FERWAFA, Uwayezu François Régis, yabwiye IGIHE ko ibyo bihano byahawe Ngaboyisonga bizatangira gukurikizwa ubwo Shampiyona izaba isubukuwe, aho kuri ubu imikino yose yahagaze kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ngaboyisonga abaye umusifuzi wa kane wo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere, uhagaritswe muri uku kwezi nyuma ya Hakizimana Abdul wasifuye umukino AS Kigali yanganyijemo na Mukura Victory Sports ibitego 2-2, na we wahagaritswe ibyumweru bine.
Nsabimana Célestin wayoboye umukino Gasogi United yatsinzemo Espoir FC, yahagaritswe ibyumweru bibiri mu gihe Nizeyimana Is’haq yahagaritswe ibyumweru bine kubera penaliti ebyiri atatanze mu mukino AS Kigali yatsinzemo Police FC.

Title: Tanzania yafatiye ibyemezo abakinnyi barimo Migi na Meddie Kagere
Body:
Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF), Wallace Karia, yihanangirije amakipe kutemerera abakinnyi ndetse n’abatoza b’abanyamahanga kujya mu bihugu byabo muri iki gihe Isi yose yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF), Wallace Karia, yihanangirije amakipe kutemerera abakinnyi ndetse n’abatoza b’abanyamahanga kujya mu bihugu byabo muri iki gihe Isi yose yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Karia avuga ko kwemerera abakozi b’abanyamahanga gusohoka mu gihugu bizaba binyuranyije n’amabwiriza ya guverinoma yerekeye guhangana n’icyo cyorezo ndetse abasohotse muri Tanzania batazemererwa gukina Shampiyona nisubukurwa.
Ati "Ntabwo tuzabemerera gusubira mu gihugu. Abakinnyi b’abanyamahanga bagiye mu bihugu byabo mu gihe cya shampiyona ntibazemererwa kwitabira shampiyona mu rwego rwo gukumira Coronavirus.”
Ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 20 Werurwe, Tanzania yahagaritse Shampiyona n’amarushanwa yayo yose mu rwego rwo kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe, Kassim Majuwa, yerekeranye no guhangana n’indwara zandura cyane.
Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 22 Werurwe, Tanzania yatangaje ko ifite abantu 12 banduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus, barimo batandatu bashya bamenyekanye kuri iki Cyumweru.
Abanyarwanda Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste ‘Migi’ ukinira KMC FC na Meddie Kagere ukinira Simba SC, bagarutse mu Rwanda ku wa Gatandatu, bakaba bari mu bashobora kugongwa n’iki cyemezo cyafashwe muri Tanzania nubwo baje bahawe uruhushya n’amakipe yabo.
Abandi Banyarwanda babarizwa muri Shampiyona ya Tanzania ni Niyonzima Haruna na Sibomana Patrick bombi bakinira Yanga SC, Thierry Hitimana utoza Namungo FC ndetse na Bizimungu Ally.
Ubwo Shampiyona ya Tanzania yahagarikwaga, Simba yari iyoboye n’amanota 71, ikurikiwe na Azam FC n’amanota 54 naho Yanga SC ari iya gatatu n’amanota 51. Simba na Azam bakinnye imikino 28 mu gihe Yanga SC ifite umukino w’ikirarane.

Title: Se wa Luka Jović ashyigikiye ko umuhungu we ukinira Real Madrid atabwa muri yombi
Body:
Umubyeyi w’umukinnyi wa Real Madrid, Luka Jović, asanga umuhungu we akwiye kwemera ibihano byose azahabwa kubera ko atubahirije akato k’iminsi 14 yari yarashyizwemo agahitamo kujya i Belgrade muri Serbia.
Umubyeyi w’umukinnyi wa Real Madrid, Luka Jović, asanga umuhungu we akwiye kwemera ibihano byose azahabwa kubera ko atubahirije akato k’iminsi 14 yari yarashyizwemo agahitamo kujya i Belgrade muri Serbia.
Ikipe yose ya Real Madrid imaze iminsi mu kato nyuma y’uko hari umukinnyi wa Real Madrid ya Basketball wagaragayeho Coronavirus kandi amakipe yombi akaba asangira ibibuga.
Rutahizamu Luka Jović yanenzwe n’abatari bake nyuma y’aho afashe icyemezo cyo kujya kwishimira isabukuru y’amavuko y’umukunzi we muri Serbia, nyamara yakabaye ari mu rugo, mu kato k’iminsi 14 mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Ibi byakuruye imyigaragambyo ikomeye muri Serbia ndetse Perezida w’icyo gihugu, Aleksandar Vučić, yasabye ko uyu mukinnyi hamwe na Nikola Ninković ukina mu cyiciro cya kabiri mu Butaliyani, bombi batabwa muri yombi bitewe n’uko barenze ku mabwiriza.
Perezida Vučić yagize ati “Umwe muri bo (Ninković) ari muri hoteli, undi (Jović) ari mu nzu ye. Niba umwe muri bo avuye aho hantu, bazafatwa. Ndibwira ko bombi bicuza ibyo bakoze, ariko nzabasobanurira ko ubuzima bw’abantu ari ngombwa cyane kuruta miliyoni zabo. Nubwo bimeze bityo ariko, nta muntu n’umwe tuzabamba ku musaraba.”
Luka Jović yasabye imbabazi avuga ko yarenze ku mabwiriza y’akato kubera kutamenya.
Se w’uyu mukinnyi, Milan Jović, yatangarije Puls Online ko umuhungu we yakoze amakosa ndetse akwiye kwemera ibihano byose azagenerwa.
Ati “Luka yapimwe Coronavirus inshuro ebyiri basanga ari muzima, niyo mpamvu yatekereje kuza muri Serbia kandi ubu birasa naho ari icyaha gikomeye. Niba agomba kujya muri gereza, ubwo azajyamo.”
“Ndemeranya neza na Perezida ndetse na Minisitiri w’Intebe [kubera ibyaba aregwa], ariko gusa mu gihe byaba bimuhamye. Nashyigikira icyo cyemezo ari uko yakoze ikintu kibi, ariko yaje muri Belgrade, aguma mu rugo.”
“Sofia [Umukunzi we] yari atwite, kandi ntabwo yashoboraga kujya hanze ngo yishimire isaburu ye y’amavuko. Amafoto yagiye hanze bari kumwe basohotse, ni ayo muri Espagne.”
Luka Jović azaguma muri Serbia mu gihe gito kiri imbere kuko iki gihugu kitabarizwa mu Muryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi (EU) cyafunze imipaka ku wa Gatanu ndetse na EU (ibarizwamo Espagne) ikaba yarafunze imipaka ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 17 Werurwe.
Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 22 yaguzwe na Real Madrid mu mpeshyi ishize mu 2019, atanzweho miliyoni 65$ ku masezerano y’imyaka itandatu, avuye muri Eintracht Frankfurt yo mu Budage.

Title: Imibereho ya Ronaldinho muri gereza iratangaje! Ku isabukuru ye y’amavuko yokerejwe inyama n’imfungwa
Body:
Umunyabigwi w’Umunya-Brésil, Ronaldo de Assis Moreira wamenyekanye nka Ronaldinho Gaúcho, yizihirije isabukuru ye y’amavuko y’imyaka 40 muri gereza yo muri Paraguay, aho yokesherezwa inyama n’imfungwa.
Umunyabigwi w’Umunya-Brésil, Ronaldo de Assis Moreira wamenyekanye nka Ronaldinho Gaúcho, yizihirije isabukuru ye y’amavuko y’imyaka 40 muri gereza yo muri Paraguay, aho yokesherezwa inyama n’imfungwa.
Ronaldinho amaze iminsi afungiye muri Paraguay, akurikiranyweho gukoresha impapuro (pasiporo) mpimbano ndetse yabwiwe ko we na mukuru we, bazamara amezi atandatu bafunzwe.
Ubwo yizihizaga isabukuru y’imyaka 40 ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, Ronaldinho yokerejwe inyama n’imfungwa bari kumwe muri gereza yo muri Paraguay.
Abakinnyi benshi bakinannye barimo abo batwaranye Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2002, bamwoherereje ubutumwa bumwifuriza isabukuru nziza babinyujije kuri Instagram.
Abo barimo Ronaldo w’imyaka 43, washyizeho ifoto bari kumwe, Roberto Carlos w’imyaka 46 na Samuel Eto’o bakinannye muri FC Barcelone.
Ubusanzwe Ronaldinho yajyaga yishimira isabukuru ye y’amavuko mu birori. Ubwo yuzuzaga imyaka 26, yaraye mu kabyiniro ko mu Mujyi wa Barcelone kugeza saa Kumi n’ebyiri za mu gitondo mu gihe ubwo yagiraga imyaka 32, yizihije iyi sabukuru iminsi itanu, bimutwara ibihumbi 10 by’ama-eurp muri hoteli ihenze y’i Rio de Janeiro muri Brésil.
ESPN yatangaje ko Ronaldinho "akunzwe" na bagenzi be bafunganywe nubwo amara igihe kinini muri kasho ya gereza, ibikorwa bye bya buri munsi bikaba gukina umupira n’imfungwa n’abakozi ndetse no kwitabira amasomo y’ububaji.
ESPN itangaza ko kandi uwo yaganiriye na we, yavuze ko “Ronaldinho ameze neza muri gereza” nubwo yabuze imwe mu nkingi z’ubuzima bwe: umuziki. Igihe cye kinini nyuma yo gusezerera umupira w’amaguru akaba yarakimaze acuranga ingoma za bongo.
Yagize ati "Ntashobora gucuranga imbere muri gereza ariko nzi neza ko mu mutwe we azakomeza kugira injyana z’indirimbo igihe azaba ari hanze."
"Akina umupira w’amaguru buri munsi kandi yigisha abasore akina nabo amayeri make. Kuva akinjira muri gereza, yashakaga kumenyana n’izindi mfungwa kandi yahise abikora. Ni nk’ikigirwamana kuri benshi muri bo, bamusabye gusinya ku ngofero, imipira bambara n’indi myambaro.”
Mu minsi ishize, hashyizwe hanze amafoto n’amashusho agaragaza uyu mugabo wabaye umukinnyi w’umwaka wa FIFA ku Isi inshuro ebyiri, yambaye ikabutura n’umupira, akina umupira muri gereza.
Yitabiriye kandi umukino wa Futsal mu cyumweru gishize, afasha ikipe ye gutsinda bagenzi babo b’imfungwa ibitego 11-2, aho bivugwa ko yatsinzemo ibitego bitanu akanatanga imipira itandatu yavuyemo ibindi bitego.
Mu minsi mike ishize kandi, Umuyobozi wa gereza, Blas Vera, yatangaje ko Ronaldinho na mukuru we, hari icyubahiro bahabwa.
Basangira ubwiherero n’izindi mfungwa ariko buri umwe afite kasho ye hamwe na televiziyo n’ibyuma bituma bagira umuyaga mu cyumba ndetse akaba ahabwa umwanya wo kuganira n’inshuti ze kuri WhatsApp, aho umwanya munini awuharira umuryango we.
Undi waganiriye na ESPN yavuze ko umwanya munini Ronaldinho amara kuri telefoni, awumara avugana na nyina.
Ati "Avugana na nyina buri munsi nimugoroba. Ni umwe mu bangayikisha cyane Ronaldinho."
Nk’uko Ibiro ntaramakuru EFE bibitangaza, ngo kuva abapolisi ba Paraguay batangiye gukora iperereza ku buryo Ronaldinho na mukuru we bagiye muri icyo gihugu, bamaze guta muri yombi abantu 14.
Mu bafashwe harimo abayobozi benshi bo mu ishami rishinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka mu gihugu bafashije koroshya ikorwa ry’izo mpapuro [pasiporo] mpimbano. Iyi mibare kandi irimo abagabo babiri bakoresheje ibihumbi 18$ yo kubona pasiporo mpimbano, bishyikirije polisi mu cyumweru gishize. Wilmondes Sousa Lira, Umunya-Brésil wahaye pasiporo aba bavandimwe, na we yatawe muri yombi.
Abakora iperereza bavuga ko ubu barimo gusuzuma dosiye n’ubutumwa kuri telefone za Ronaldinho, mukuru we, n’abandi bantu bafatiwe muri iki kirego.
Ronaldinho ngo amaze iminsi abaririza amakuru y’indege zikora ingendo hagati ya Asunción na Rio de Janeiro kugira ngo narekurwa azahite yerekeza ku kibuga cy’indege.
Iburanishwa rye ryabaye ryigijwe inyuma kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus nk’uko byemejwe n’umwunganizi we, Sergio Queiroz.

Title: Abafana ba Rayon Sports bamaze gukusanya asaga miliyoni 2 Frw yo kugoboka ikipe yabo
Body:
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza gushyigikira ikipe yabo no kuyitera inkunga muri ibi bihe imikino yahagaze, abafana ba Rayon Sports bamaze gukusanya 2,475,604 Frw mu gihe cy’iminsi itatu gusa.
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza gushyigikira ikipe yabo no kuyitera inkunga muri ibi bihe imikino yahagaze, abafana ba Rayon Sports bamaze gukusanya 2,475,604 Frw mu gihe cy’iminsi itatu gusa.
Iki gikorwa cyatangijwe na Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, aho ku wa Kane tariki ya 19 Werurwe 2020, yasabye abakunzi b’iyi kipe kuyiba hafi muri ibi bihe imikino yahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ubutumwa ubuyobozi bw’ikipe bwanyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye bugira buti “Ikipe wihebeye iragukeneye, burya inshuti nyanshuti uyibona mu bihe bikomeye. Turwanye Coronavirus tunaharanira ko itadusenyera ikipe. Ni wowe, ni njyewe bo gufasha Rayon Sports kudasenywa na COVID-19 utanga icyo ushoboye. Kanda *610#, hera ku giceri cy’i 100 uraba ufashije ikipe.”
Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports buvuga ko intego bwihaye ari ukugeza miliyoni 20 Frw.
Nk’uko byemejwe n’Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports binyuze ku rubuga rwa Twitter, ku munsi wa mbere (Ku wa Kane tariki ya 19 Werurwe) hatanzwe 1,045,752 Frw, uwa kabiri (Ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 20 Werurwe) warangiye ageze 1,914,599 Frw mu gihe uwa gatatu (kuwa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe) wasize ageze 2,475,604 Frw.
Gahunda yo gufasha Équipe yacu binyuze kuri *610# irakomeje amafaranga yose hamwe kugera ejo le 21/03/2020 ni 2.475.604frw two gucika intege dukomeze dushyigikire Équipe yacu. Kdi mfashe uyu mwanya nshimira mwe mwese mukomeje kudufasha nakomeza kubihanganisha kubera Coronavirus
— Munyakazi Sadate (@SadateMunyakazi) March 22, 2020
Rayon Sports ikoresha hafi miliyoni 20 Frw ku kwezi mu guhemba abakinnyi n’abakozi b’ikipe, gutegura imikino no mu bindi bikorwa by’ikipe.
Iyi kipe ubusanzwe yinjiza amafaranga iyakuye mu baterankunga barangajwe imbere n’uruganda rw’ibinyobwa rwa SKOL ndetse n’amafaranga yinjiye ku kibuga.
Rayon Sports iheruka kwakira Gicumbi FC tariki ya 14 Werurwe mu mukino wabaye mu muhezo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, gusa imikino yabaye ihagaritswe kugeza igihe kitazwi mu gihe kandi nta mafaranga iheruka guhabwa na SKOL mu rwego rwo kwishyura amadeni yagurijwe nk’uko bitangazwa na Munyakazi Sadate.

Title: Marouane Fellaini wakiniye Manchester United yanduye Coronavirus
Body:
Uwahoze ari umukinnyi wa Manchester United na Everton zo mu Bwongereza, Umubiligi Marouane Fellaini yanduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye abatari bake ku Isi.
Uwahoze ari umukinnyi wa Manchester United na Everton zo mu Bwongereza, Umubiligi Marouane Fellaini yanduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye abatari bake ku Isi.
Marouane Fellaini yabaye umukinnyi wa mbere ukina muri Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere mu Bushinwa, ufashwe n’icyo cyorezo.
Fellaini w’imyaka 32, yanduye nyuma y’uko yari yasubiye mu Bushinwa, mu Ntara ya Jinan, ahabarizwa ikipe ya Shandong Luneng akinira.
Inzego zishinzwe ubuzima muri Janan, zemeje ko uyu mukinnyi yanduye Coronavirus nyuma y’iminsi ibiri gusa ahageze na gari ya moshi, aho yagombaga kumara iminsi 14 mu kato nk’umuntu uvuye mu Burayi.
Marouane Fellaini akinira Shandong kuva mu 2019, aho yanagize umwaka mwiza w’imikino, atsinda ibitego 13 muri Shampiyona, ikipe ye isoza iri ku mwanya wa gatanu muri Super League y’u Bushinwa.
Byitezwe ko Shampiyona y’u Bushinwa kuri ubu yahagaritswe nyuma y’uko iki gihugu ari cyo cyatangiriyemo icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ishobora gusubukurwa tariki ya 18 Mata, akaba ari nayo mpamvu Fellaini yari yasubiyeyo.
Coronavirus ikomeje kwibasira abantu batandukanye idasize abakinnyi, abatoza n’abayobozi b’amakipe y’umupira w’amaguru.
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, nibwo Paulo Dybala ukinira Juventus yo mu Butaliyani, yemeje ko we n’umukunzi we, Oriana, bombi banduye Coronavirus.
Dybala yabaye umukinnyi wa gatatu wa Juventus wanduye iki cyorezo nyuma ya Daniel Rugani na Blaise Matuidi.
Icyo cyorezo cyahitanye kandi uwahoze Perezida wa Real Madrid, Lorenzo Sanz witabye Imana ku wa Gatandatu afite imyaka 76.

Title: Paulo Dybala wa Juventus, umukunzi we na Maldini wa Milan AC banduye Coronavirus
Body:
Rutahizamu wa Juventus n’ikipe y’igihugu ya Argentine, Paulo Dybala, hamwe n’umukunzi we, Oriana, bombi bemeje ko banduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Rutahizamu wa Juventus n’ikipe y’igihugu ya Argentine, Paulo Dybala, hamwe n’umukunzi we, Oriana, bombi bemeje ko banduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Paulo Dybala byari byatangajwe ko yanduye iki cyorezo mu minsi yashize, ariko biza kunyomozwa,. Kuri ubu yemeje aya makuru binyuze mu butumwa yashize ku rubuga rwa Instagram kuwa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020.
Uyu mukinnyi yavuze ko we n’umukunzi we, Oriana, bombi banduye Coronavirus, ariko bameze neza.
Ati “Twembi Oriana nanjye, twanduye Coronavirus. Ku bw’amahirwe tumeze neza."
Paulo Dybala yabaye umukinnyi wa gatatu wa Juventus ugaragayeho icyorezo cya Coronavirus nyuma ya Daniele Rugani ukina mu mutima wa ba myugariro ndetse n’Umufaransa Blaise Matuidi ukina mu kibuga hagati.
Umukunzi wa Dybala, Oriana Sabatini, asanzwe ari umuhanzikazi n’umukinnyi wa filimi na we ukomoka muri Argentine ndetse ni umwishywa w’uwahoze ari umukinnyi wa Tennis, Gabriela Sabatini watwaye US Open mu 1990.
Uretse aba bombi, ikipe ya Milan AC yemeje ko kandi Umuyobozi wayo wa Tekiniki, Paulo Maldini wigeze kuba umukinnyi ukomeye mu myaka yashize, we n’umuhungu we, Daniel Maldini w’imyaka 18, bombi banduye Coronavirus.
Milan AC yavuze ko Daniel Maldini yari amaze iminsi yitoza hamwe n’abakinnyi b’ikipe ya mbere, ariko we na se w’imyaka 51, bazamara ibyumweru bibiri mu kato kugeza igihe bakiriye.
Aba bose byatangajwe ko banduye mu gihe ibikorwa byose by’imikino byahagaritswe mu Butaliyani kugeza tariki ya 3 Mata 2020 mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Imibare yo kuwa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, igaragaza ko u Butaliyani aricyo gihugu cyibasiwe na Coronavirus kurusha ibindi ku Isi, aho ejo hashize icyo cyorezo cyahitanye abantu 793 bigatuma igiteranyo cy’abamaze gupfa muri icyo gihugu kigera kuri 4825.

Title: Uwahoze ari Perezida wa Real Madrid yahitanywe na Coronavirus
Body:
Uwahoze ari Umuyobozi w’Ikipe ya Real Madrid yo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere muri Espagne, Lorenzo Sanz, yitabye Imana ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, aguye mu bitaro, aho yari arwaye Coronavirus.
Uwahoze ari Umuyobozi w’Ikipe ya Real Madrid yo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere muri Espagne, Lorenzo Sanz, yitabye Imana ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, aguye mu bitaro, aho yari arwaye Coronavirus.
Lorenzo Sanz wari ufite imyaka 76, yabaye Perezida wa Real Madrid hagati y’umwaka wa 1995 na 2000, iyi kipe yegukanamo ibikombe bibiri bya UEFA Champions League.
Igikombe cya mbere Real Madrid yagitwaye mu 1998 itsinze Juventus ku mukino wa nyuma, yari imaze imyaka 32 itegukana irushanwa ry’u Burayi.
Mbere yo kuba Perezida w’ikipe, Lorenzo yamaze imyaka 10 ari Umuyobozi wa Siporo.
Umuhungu we, Lorenzo San Duran, yatangaje ko se yitabye Imana abinyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter.
Yagize ati “Data yitabye Imana. Ntabwo yari akwiye iherezo rimeze gutya. Umwe mu bantu beza, b’intwari kandi bakoraga cyane nabonye mu buzima bwanjye. Umuryango we na Real Madrid ni byo yashyiraga imbere."
Ubwo yari Perezida w’iyi kipe imaze kwegukana ibikombe 33 bya Shampiyona ya Espagne, Lorenzo yaguze abakinnyi barimo Roberto Carlos, Clarence Seedorf, Nicholas Anelka na Davor Suker.
Yatsinzwe na Florentino Perez mu 2000 ku mwanya wo gukomeza kuyobora iyi kipe, ndetse akaba ariho Real Madrid yatangiriye ibihe bishya bya “Galácticos” itangira gukoresha amafaranga menshi.
Umuhungu we, Fernando, yakiniye Real Madrid hagati ya 1996 na 1999 mbere yo kwerekeza muri Malaga, aho yakinnye imyaka irindwi, akanahasoreza umupira we.
Lorenzo Sanz yaguze kandi ikipe ya Malaga mu 2006, ayigurisha nyuma y’imyaka ine.
